title: [Ta'Vaalor Hall, Courtyard]
description: Surrounded by a tall, neatly trimmed hawthorn hedge is an enclosed cobblestone courtyard.  A small riverstone bench sits off to the side under an oak tree.  Climbing roses planted in large stone urns creep up the wall and twine together over the wide ebonwood door.

Surrounded by a tall, neatly trimmed hawthorn hedge and shaded from the sunlight by tall trees is an enclosed cobblestone courtyard.  A small riverstone bench sits off to the side under an oak tree.  Climbing roses planted in large stone urns creep up the wall and twine together over the wide ebonwood door.
